mapper.select: SELECT address.user_name AS uaerName, address.detail AS detail, address.mobile AS mobile, award.award_name AS awardName, award.general_coin AS generalCoin, award.coin AS coin, award.image AS image, award.award_intro AS awardIntro FROM address, award, exchange WHERE address.address_id = exchange.address_id AND award.award_id=exchange.award_id AND exchange.is_delete=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exchange(address_id, award_id, status, create_time) VALUES (#{addressId}, #{awardId}, #{status}, now())
